//
// This file contains the test vectors for the Hamming(7,4) code.
// The next seven columns are the inputs: h_code[7:1].
// The next three columns are the parity correction code (bad bits).
// The last four columns are the code output data.
// It needs to be 128 lines long to cover all possibilities.
//
0000000_000_0000
0000001_001_0000
0000010_010_0000
0000011_011_0000
0000100_011_0001
0000101_010_0001
0000110_001_0001
0000111_000_0001
0001000_100_0000
0001001_101_0000
0001010_110_0000
0001011_111_0000
0001100_111_0001
0001101_110_0001
0001110_101_0001
0001111_100_0001
0010000_101_0010
0010001_100_0010
0010010_111_0010
0010011_110_0010

0011001_000_0010

0011101_011_0011
0011110_000_0011
0011111_001_0011
